title: Understanding Educational Technology Programs and Exploring Future Prospects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational technology concepts and experience using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Instructional design program development and application competency enhancement course for corporate language education managers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components and operational methods of an educational technology program.
Learners can analyze and apply the impact of technological advancements on language education.
Learners can propose project designs and evaluation methods reflecting future education trends.
Learners can utilize effective educational material development and management methods in an LMS-based environment.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)
Educational Technology E-Books and Case Study Collections
Digital Content Creation Tools (Screen-Casting, Editing Software)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
